snippet.title: AI Analysed 55 Sources, Created Slides & Podcast in 10 Minutes
snippet.description:
ðŸ”— Visit: https://skywork.ai/p/gWho5T
ðŸ’° Special Offer: Get 20% off 

Discover how to transform AI research into professional presentations and podcasts using SkyWork AI's powerful deep research agent. This comprehensive tutorial shows you how to create detailed reports, PowerPoint presentations, and engaging podcasts from a single interface.

## What You'll Learn:
âœ… How to use SkyWork AI's Deep Research Agent for comprehensive analysis
âœ… Creating detailed research reports with 50+ cited sources
âœ… Automatically generating professional PowerPoint presentations
âœ… Converting research into engaging podcast episodes with AI voices
âœ… Analyzing data and creating charts from spreadsheets
âœ… Using the Knowledge Base for seamless content workflow

## Key Features Covered:
- Deep Mode research with Google Scholar, Semantic Scholar, and News API integration
- Multi-source web research with real-time progress tracking
- Image analysis and visual content processing
- Auto-generated covers and table of contents
- Professional slide creation with customizable themes
- AI-powered podcast script writing and voice generation
- Excel data analysis and chart creation

## Timestamps:
0:00 - Introduction to SkyWork AI
0:15 - Deep Research Agent Demo (AI Benchmarks 2025)
1:18 - Getting Started with SkyWork AI
2:17 - Creating PowerPoint Presentations from Research
3:00 - Slide Generation Process
4:58 - Building Podcasts from Reports
6:02 - Listening to AI-Generated Podcast
6:49 - Bonus: Data Analysis from Spreadsheets

## Example Use Case:
This video demonstrates creating a complete research project on "AI Benchmarks 2025" - from initial deep research analyzing 55 sources, to a professional 6-10 slide presentation, to a podcast episode with two AI speakers discussing the findings.



Perfect for researchers, content creators, students, educators, and anyone looking to streamline their content creation workflow with AI assistance.

#AITools #DeepResearch #ContentCreation #AIAgent #Productivity #SkyWorkAI #AIBenchmarks #PodcastCreation #PowerPoint #ResearchTools
